news.title: US offers $50m reward for arrest of Venezuelan leader Nicol√°s Maduro
news.summary: A reward for information leading to the capture of Maduro, who the US accuses of drug trafficking, has been doubled.

news.title: Mushroom murderer's alleged attempts to kill husband revealed
news.summary: One alleged attempt left Simon Patterson in a coma, with his family twice told to say their goodbyes.

news.title: Mandalorian actress settles lawsuit with Disney over firing
news.summary: Gina Carano sued for wrongful termination with the support and funding of billionaire Elon Musk.

news.title: Southern European butterfly spotted in UK for first time
news.summary: Experts have tracked the Southern Small White's expansion northwards through Europe over decades.

news.title: The Papers:  'Minister for hypocrisy' and 'Pill for weight loss on NHS'
news.summary: Homelessness minister Rushanara Ali has been forced to resign after it was alleged that she "ejected" tenants from one of her properties.

news.title: Crocs shares slump as US shoppers rein in spending
news.summary: The firms says it expects revenue for the three months to the end of August to fall by about 10% compared with last year.

news.title: Convicted rapist quits Australian parliament after losing legal bid to stay
news.summary: Gareth Ward was convicted of rape last month but refused to resign from his electorate.

news.title: Dozens of migrants detained under 'one in, one out' deal with France
news.summary: The detentions came as people arrived in Dover on Wednesday, the first day the pilot scheme came into force.
